<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>nlq_cmdb_implicit_relationship</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Unique implicit relationship records</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var fromTable = current.from_table; var filter = current.filter; var toTable = current.to_table; if ((fromTable != previous.from_table) || (filter != previous.filter) || (toTable != previous.to_table)) { var cmdbImplicitRelTypeRecord = new GlideRecord("nlq_cmdb_implicit_relationship"); cmdbImplicitRelTypeRecord.addQuery("from_table", fromTable); cmdbImplicitRelTypeRecord.addQuery("filter", filter); cmdbImplicitRelTypeRecord.addQuery("to_table", toTable); cmdbImplicitRelTypeRecord.query();
if (cmdbImplicitRelTypeRecord.hasNext()) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Cmdb Implicit relationship for the specified From table, Filters and To table already exist. Please update the existing record.")); current.setAbortAction(true); } }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-09-16 11:23:23</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>30ea5f7253223010df5fddeeff7b12bd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Unique implicit relationship records</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Natural Language Query" source="com.snc.nlq">bb8b74643c35311068bcf327dfe37fe1</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_30ea5f7253223010df5fddeeff7b12bd</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-12-03 18:25:24</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=30ea5f7253223010df5fddeeff7b12bd"/> </record_update>
